name: UFO: The Escape Adventure
description:
A fun fast paced game, fly in deep space in your UFO,but avoid those lazers set by the enemies,collect SpaceRingz .Very Addictive Gameplay.Endless Gameplay to achieve massive highscores. Cartoony Funny Graphics, Avoid those lasers ! they can kill you ! Very easy to play,minimal interface.

Download now ! --> https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dolly9.ufo
